channel.title: VPS Help
channel.description:
Sorry if this is the wrong section, but this is related to the server in a way, I guess.
Problem: This may be retarded. I just bought a VPS and I need to know how to use it... I logged into the website and there are all these weird functions and everything but... how do I use it and turn it on or whatever? Is it a box that comes in the mail or something that you install? Nobody has ever told me anything about VPS's, so I just bought one for the heck of it. I thought it would email me some instructions or something, but they didn't.. So I came to you moparscapers :) please help me thanks.
